Text: Heard about this movie. Thought I'd give it a look. Appreciate the share.

IMBD rates this 7.5 / 10

Video / Audio quality is perfect.
Shame the subtitles are in Chinese or something. Can anyone show me a link for english subtitles for this?

Not entirely sure mr. no-newbie, [haven't downloaded it], but I'd bet the subs are both English and Chinese.  If you have a decent media player, you can switch which subs you're seeing.  If you're on Windows, I recommend Media Player Classic.  It'll do it.
thanks a lot fasamoo! always wanted to see this..
